price: Na Dan kada će se u rog puhnuti – taj dan ćemo prestupnike modre sakupiti,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
